attributes.action: Ross Parker's murderers to be charged under the terrorism act....
attributes.additional_details:
21st sept 2001
Ross Andrew Parker aged 17 was murdered in a racially motivated attack in Peterborough...

His Murderers were head to say they wanted to be part of the terrorist group Al Qaeda and they attacked and murdered Ross for that reason...

Each was convicted of murder and sentenced to life eligible for parole after 13/14 years... This should of been tried as a terrorist attack and they should never be set free to attack another British citizen or put the lives of others in danger.
